list: Managed day-to-day operations of the e-commerce website, ensuring accurate product listings and site updates.
Created and maintained product catalog: added new products, descriptions, images, pricing, categories, and variants.
Monitored and updated inventory/stock levels and coordinated availability to prevent overselling.
Planned, launched, and optimized Google Ads campaigns (Search/Shopping/Display).
Planned, launched, and optimized Meta Ads campaigns (Facebook), including audience targeting and retargeting.
Designed/produced marketing creatives (banners/ad visuals) for online campaigns and promotions.
Coordinated website promotions, seasonal campaigns and product launches.
Converted Figma designs into web pages using React and Next.js with TypeScript.
Built and maintained back-end functionality using Node.js(Express).
Integrated front-end with APIs and handled data flow between client and server.
